page.title: 12Community Education
page.content: In line with Local Authority policy there is a Community Education Facility associated with the Aboyne Schools. This involves Further Education Evening and Day Classes and Leisure and Interest Activities. A comprehensive list of these best indicates the scope of Community Education efforts: Aerobics,Badminton,Conversational French, Drama, Newsletter, Dressmaking, Fly-tying, Football, Housewives Register, Oil-painting, Rockwall Climbing, Typing, Young Farmers, Sub Aqua Club, Social Club, Children's Music, Guides, Brownies, Scouts, Cubs, Gymnastics, Youth Club, Swim Club, Playgroup, Archery, Canoeing, Music Society, Film Group, Camera Club, Golf Tuition, Guitar, Judo, Modelling, Rugby, Tennis, Disabled Group, Orienteering, C.N.D.
